page.title: 06REGENCY GARAGE,HAWLEY.
page.content: {The garage started as a bungalow and a shed with an old hand operated pump.In {1961}the present owners began renting the site and after five years they were able to buy the garage.It has remained as a private {family}business since{1966}.It has now been modernised and now has {five }petrol pumps and{ {one}diesel pump. The pumps are re-filled three times a week with the use of{"off set fills"} .This means that the pumps are filled through pipes at the side of the site.Every week the garage receives{ {28,000}litres of two star petrol,{ {84,000}litres of four star, and { {10,000}litres of diesel. In 1984 {vandals}set fire to paper bins and smashed windows.An alarm system was installed and this has stopped the vandalism.The alarm is sometimes set off by lorries or wind.
